Method Detail

setPostureTolerance

public void setPostureTolerance(float _postureTolerance)
Setter for the tolerance with which posture will be detected. 0..1f.

Parameters:
the - tolerance between 0..1f. when higher than 1 or lower than 0, default tolerance 0.3f will be set

getPostureTolerance

public float getPostureTolerance()
Getter for posture tolerance

Returns:
the posture tolerance

getCurrentUpperBodyPosture

public short getCurrentUpperBodyPosture()
Upper body posture is evaluated corresponding to one of the following shapes on the local x-axis or to one of the other articulated poses. This method returns the evaluated upper body posture. works only if posture was calculated in the current update cycle

(H = hand, E = elbow, S = shoulder)
----------------------
H H
E E = V
SS
----------------------
SS
E E = A
H H
----------------------
H H
= U
E SS E
----------------------
E SS E
= N
H H
----------------------
E E
SS = M
H H
----------------------
H H
SS = W
E E
--------------------------------------------
HH SS
E E = O = E E
SS HH
--------------------------------------------
HH SS
EE = I = EE
SS HH
--------------------------------------------
on the z axis:----------------------------
SS
EE = HANDS_FORWARD_DOWN
HH
--------------------------------------------

Returns:
current upper body posture. short, constants of Skeleton class, NO_POSE if posture was not updated

evaluate

public void evaluate()
Evaluate posture and store results internally. Access recognized posture using getter-methods.
